qrList.label: User
qrList.title: Test send
qrList.message:
/setvar key=varname preset |
/run creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=true rule=eq else="/setvar key=userinput {{input}} \| /flushvar nadanada" "/run {{getvar::preset}}.userprocess" |
/setvar key=append |
/if left=blocktrigger right=true rule=eq "/setvar key=blocktrigger false \| /abort" |
/send {{getvar::userinput}}{{newline}}{{getvar::append}} |
/flushvar nadanada | /setinput

qrList.label: ‚ùåüí¨
qrList.title: Delete message
qrList.message:
/buttons labels=["prev","last"] Delete which message? | /setvar key=del |
/if left=del right=prev rule=eq "/sub \{\{lastMessageId\}\} 1 \| /cut \{\{pipe\}\}" |
/if left=del right=last rule=eq "/cut \{\{lastMessageId\}\}"

qrList.label: ‚úÇ.?!
qrList.title: Delete last sentence. Makes orig backup.
qrList.message:
/hide {{lastMessageId}} | /flushvar toreplace |
/setvar key=regexflags i |
/setvar key=regex (?<=[.?!"\)])\s[^.!?]+?[".!?\)]*?(?=\s*```[\S\s]+?```$\|\s*<!--[\S\s]+?-->$\|\s*\[[\S\s]*?\]\(#'[\S\s]+?'\)$\|$) |
/regex name=regexreplace {{lastMessage}} |
/sendas name="{{char}}"

qrList.label: ‚ùå</>
qrList.title: Wipe out <tags>, [bracketed messages], and asterisks.
qrList.message:
/hide {{lastMessageId}} | /flushvar toreplace |
/setvar key=regexflags gi |
/setvar key=regex <(?!\!--\|\/?thinking)\/?[\S\s]*?>\|\[[\S\s]*?\](?!\()\|\* |
/regex name=regexreplace {{lastMessage}} |
/sendas name="{{char}}"

qrList.label: ü¶ñ
qrList.title: Replace words/phrases. Makes backup orig.

qrList.label: thesaurusreplace
qrList.message:
/setvar key=startregex \s* | /setvar key=endregex \s+= |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=from |

/setvar key=startregex \s+=\s+ | /setvar key=endregex \s*\n |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=to |

/setvar key=toreplace {{getvar::to}} |
/setvar key=regexflags gi |
/setvar key=regex {{getvar::from}} |
/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::msg}} | /setvar key=msg |

/flushvar toreplace |
/setvar key=regexflags mi |
/setvar key=regex ^[\S\s]+?$ |
/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::thesaurus}} |
/setvar key=thesaurus | /setvar key=tomsgprocess |

/len {{getvar::thesaurus}} | /setvar key=len |
/if left=len rule=lte right=0 "/setvar key=looping false" |

/if left=thesaurus rule=lte right=0 "/setvar key=looping false"
